org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest

Class HttpRestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
      • org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest.HttpRestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelUpstreamHandler

    public abstract class HttpRestHandler
extends org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
    Handler for HTTP Rest support
    Author:
    Frederic Bregier

      • checkConnection

        protected abstract void checkConnection(org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel)
                                 throws HttpInvalidAuthenticationException
        To be used for instance to check correctness of connection
        Note that ARG_METHOD is only set from current request. It might be also set from URI or HEADER and therefore should be done in this method.
        Parameters:
        channel -
        Throws:
        HttpInvalidAuthenticationException
